Directed by: Ann Hui

Description: Vietnam, recently ended war. Japanese reporter Akutagawa (George Lam) is not the first time coming to the country to make a report on how she recovers. The authorities met him with open arms and arrange tours of one of the New Economic Zones, a life in which abounds. However, Akutagawa suspects that something is wrong and one day decides to leave the city without an honorary escort. There he meets a teenage girl Cam Nuong (Sizonov Ma) and her family, and eventually learns that in fact the case in Vietnam, things are not as rosy as he try to present. (Akira)
